title: Salary not received
text: Contact payroll department to verify payment processing. Ensure your bank details are up-to-date.

title: Need to register sick leave
text: Log into the HR portal and go to the Sick Leave section to register your leave. Contact HR if access fails.

title: Cannot access HR portal
text: Ensure you're using your corporate credentials. If the problem persists, contact IT support.

title: Incorrect tax deduction
text: Review your latest payslip and contact HR with supporting documents to resolve discrepancies.

title: No access to payslip
text: Payslips are available on the HR portal. Contact HR if yours is missing or inaccessible.

title: Benefits information missing
text: Benefits information is updated quarterly. Contact HR for the latest documents or visit the benefits section.

title: Issue with time tracking
text: Ensure you’ve clocked in using the company system. Contact your manager to resolve missed punches.

title: Annual leave not showing
text: Check your remaining leave balance. Contact your manager or HR if it's not reflecting properly.

title: Cannot submit expense report
text: Ensure all receipts are attached. Check if you're using the correct expense category and resubmit.

title: System says I'm not clocked in
text: Try clocking out and back in again. If issue persists, contact time tracking system support.

title: Change bank account for salary
text: Submit a request in the HR system to update your bank information. Approval may take up to 3 days.

title: Update emergency contact
text: Navigate to your HR profile and use the Edit function to update emergency contacts.

title: Need employment certificate
text: Request an employment certificate through the HR portal or submit a formal request to HR.

title: Onboarding documents not accessible
text: Ensure your onboarding checklist is complete. Contact onboarding support for access issues.

title: Colleague details are incorrect
text: Use the HR portal to report incorrect details. HR will review and update after verification.

title: Manager approval pending
text: Wait for the manager to approve the request. You can send a reminder via the portal.

title: Can't request time off
text: Verify your eligibility for time off. If issue persists, raise a ticket to HR support.

title: Wrong job title in system
text: Raise a correction request via the Job Info section in the HR portal.

title: Performance review missing
text: Performance reviews are uploaded by managers. Check with them for any delays.

title: Promotion not reflected
text: Contact HR to update your employee record with the latest promotion details.

title: Salary not received
text: Contact payroll department to verify payment processing. Ensure your bank details are up-to-date.

text: Log into the HR portal and go to the Sick Leave section to register your leave. Contact HR if access fails.

text: If you haven't received your salary, please contact the accounting department..

title: VPN not working
text: Restart the VPN client and ensure your credentials are correct.

title: Cannot access internal application
text: Check your network connection and confirm app permissions.

title: Email not syncing
text: Ensure you are connected to the internet and sync settings are enabled.

title: Slow internet connection
text: Try restarting the router or contacting your ISP.

title: Computer won't start
text: Check the power supply and try a hard reset.

title: Printer not responding
text: Restart the printer and ensure it is connected properly.

title: Forgotten password
text: Use the password reset tool or contact IT support.

title: Blue screen error
text: Note the error code and contact support with the details.

title: Software installation failure
text: Verify system requirements and retry the installation.

title: Cannot connect to Wi-Fi
text: Make sure the Wi-Fi is enabled and try reconnecting.

title: Video conferencing issues
text: Check camera and microphone permissions in your browser.

title: USB device not recognized
text: Try a different port and update USB drivers.

title: Screen flickering
text: Update the display driver and reduce screen resolution.

title: Keyboard not working
text: Check cable connection or try another USB port.

title: Mouse lagging
text: Update mouse drivers or try another surface.

title: Battery draining fast
text: Close background apps and adjust power settings.

title: Sound not working
text: Check the audio output device and update sound drivers.

title: Camera not detected
text: Make sure camera is not blocked and update drivers.

title: System update failed
text: Free up disk space and retry the update.

title: Browser not opening
text: Clear browser cache or reinstall the browser.
